name: Oxygen Rush
description:
This is a Game that developed for Academy Club - Game Jam 2 under 48 hours Theme : If You Stop,Everyone Dies !

Swipe Up - Down : Move Up - Down

Swipe Left - Right : Move Left - Right

Cem Kaan Ugur :  Designer - Developer

Cem Celik : Developer

Eren Cicek : Sound - Story

Eren Aydın : Developer

Dogan Genc : Project Manager
